description:
Steady. Smart. Sturdy. No need to worry about your electronics running out of power and you're ready for anything with these durable, dependable SLA batteries from Tech Vision Electronics. Designed to withstand a lot more wear and tear than traditional alkaline AA batteries, our sealed lead acid battery selection provide up to 3 times longer run time too!

They also exceed the rigorous standards set by CSA International so there's no risk of leakage or corrosion when charging because they don't contain any liquid electrolyte, which means if one cell breaks the other cells will not leak out The reason most flooded lead-acid batteries leak is due to spillage in case one cell has broken down.

With our Sealed Lead Acid (SLA) batteries, managing your devices is a snap. These rugged and reliable handheld power sources keep you going with one-time use or rechargeable options to get you back on track in no time. No matter what the situation, they provide uncompromising performance that doesn't let up when the losses start to mount. From AA to D Size cells, our SLA batteries are here to take on even the toughest jobs without breaking a sweat!
name: Lead Acid Batteries
